painPoints.p1_bold: Ever feel tired of spending millions of rupiah
painPoints.p1_text: just for one studio photo session? Whether it's wedding, pre-wedding, or baby photos. Not to mention the hassle of scheduling, waiting for photographers, and editing results that sometimes take forever.
painPoints.p2_bold: Or are you a seller who is stuck?
painPoints.p2_text: Confused about product shoots, editing promo banners, or feeling 'I'm not tech-savvy'? In the end, product photos look mediocre, the audience gets bored, and sales go nowhere.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to frequently asked questions
FAQ.a1: Editin Foto is an AI-based tool that helps you edit photos professionally easily and quickly. From product photos, portraits, to interior design - everything can be done in seconds.
FAQ.q2: Is it true one-time payment for lifetime?
FAQ.a2: Yes, true! By purchasing the Lifetime Access package, you get access to all current features AND new features we will release in the future. No monthly or annual fees.
FAQ.a3: Very easy! After payment, you will get access to the dashboard. Just upload a photo, select the desired feature, and our AI will process your photo in seconds.
FAQ.q4: What if I'm not satisfied with the result?
FAQ.a4: Our AI keeps learning and improving. If the result is not as expected, you can retry with a different prompt or contact our support team for help.
FAQ.a5: We provide various payment methods including bank transfer (Virtual Account), e-wallet (OVO, DANA, ShopeePay), and QRIS. All transactions are processed through a secure payment gateway.
FAQ.a6: You can contact our support team via email or WhatsApp available on the contact page. We are ready to help 24/7.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to Editin Foto. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This document explains how we manage your data.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information necessary to process orders and improve our services, including:
items: Personal Identity: Full name for invoicing and order identification purposes.
Contact: Email address and WhatsApp number for product delivery and communication.
Payment Information: Transaction data processed securely by our payment partner (Tripay).

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: Your data is used solely for the operational purposes of our service:
items: Automatically sending digital product download links.
Providing technical support if you experience issues.
Informing about product updates or special offers (optional).

section3.title: 3. Protection & Third Parties
section3.content: We implement industry security standards to protect your data. We do not sell your data to any party. Payments are processed through an encrypted gateway (Tripay), so we do not store your credit card details or banking credentials directly.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: By accessing and purchasing products from Editin Foto, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read carefully.

section1.title: 1. Usage License
section1.content: The "Editin Foto" product you purchase provides you a Lifetime license for personal and commercial use limited to your own projects or your clients.
section1.warningText: Reselling, redistributing, or sharing original product files with others without written permission from Editin Foto. Copyright infringement will be processed according to applicable laws.

section2.title: 2. Payment & Delivery
items: Product access will be given automatically to your email after payment is confirmed PAID by the system.
Ensure the email address you enter is valid. We are not responsible for email typing errors by the user.

section3.title: 3. Refund Policy (No Refund)
section3.content: Due to the nature of our products being Digital Products that can be downloaded instantly, we DO NOT serve refund requests for any reason after the product is successfully sent or downloaded. Please ensure the product features meet your needs before purchasing.

TermsOfService.footer: Editin Ai Studio reserves the right to change these terms at any time without prior notice.
